page.title: 09HOWLISH VIEW (Part 3)
page.content: Our street is quite untidy. Lots of people throw anything on the floor. It is a hazard to old people as they can slip on some rubbish and fall over. It has been known to happen. The teacher in our street often lets me play on her computer. I enjoy it. Lots of friends come to play with me in my street. One is Paul Gibson. We play on my computer most of the time. Paul and I go for bike rides. We both have a racing bike. At the top of our street is a green. I play on the green with Tyson Errington. He is 7 years old. His little brother Warren is only 4. Carrie Errington is 10. During the school holidays I play football with Paul Eales. We have a good game in the field.
